content: The Chu-Bai Spear is a weapon in Black Myth: Wukong. It comes with solid stats, damage, and a unique effect like many of the other Weapons in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chu-Bai_Spear.md', within the main section titled 'Chu-Bai Spear'.
The content is as follows:
The Chu-Bai Spear is a weapon in Black Myth: Wukong. It comes with solid stats, damage, and a unique effect like many of the other Weapons in the game.
